code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{AuthContext}from"../../context/auth-context";import"./NavLinks.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var NavLinks=function NavLinks(props){var auth=useContext(AuthContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/",exact:true,children:"ALL USERS"})}),auth.isLoggedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/".concat(auth.userId,"/places"),children:"MY PLACES"})}),auth.isLoggedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/places/new",children:"ADD PLACE"})}),!auth.isLoggedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/auth",children:"AUTHENTICATE"})}),auth.isLoggedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:auth.logout,children:"LOGOUT"})})]});};export default NavLinks;
